verses.verse: And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Command <WH6680> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, and say <WH559> unto them <WH7133>, My oblation, my food for my offerings <WH7133> made by fire <WH801>, of a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> unto me <WH8104>, shall ye observe to offer <WH7126> unto me in their due season <WH4150>.

And thou shalt say <WH559> unto them <WH801>, This is the offering made by fire which ye shall offer <WH7126> unto Jehovah <WH3068>: he-lambs <WH3532> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old without blemish <WH8549>, two <WH8147> day by day <WH3117>, for a continual <WH8548> burnt-offering <WH5930>.
The one <WH259> lamb <WH3532> shalt thou offer <WH6213> in the morning <WH1242>, and the other <WH8145> lamb <WH3532> shalt thou offer <WH6213> at even <WH6153>;
and the tenth <WH6224> part of an ephah <WH374> of fine flour <WH5560> for a meal-offering <WH4503>, mingled <WH1101> with the fourth <WH7243> part of a hin <WH1969> of beaten <WH3795> oil <WH8081>.

It is a continual <WH8548> burnt-offering <WH5930>, which was ordained <WH6213> in mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514> for a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381>, an offering made by fire <WH801> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.

And the drink-offering <WH5262> thereof shall be the fourth <WH7243> part of a hin <WH1969> for the one <WH259> lamb <WH3532>: in the holy <WH6944> place shalt thou pour <WH5258> out a drink-offering <WH5262> of strong drink <WH7941> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.

And the other <WH8145> lamb <WH3532> shalt thou offer <WH6213> at even <WH6153>: as the meal-offering <WH4503> of the morning <WH1242>, and as the drink-offering <WH4503> thereof <WH6213>, thou shalt offer it <WH801>, an offering made by fire, of a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.

And on the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117> two <WH8147> he-lambs <WH3532> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old without blemish <WH8549>, and two <WH8147> tenth <WH6241> parts of an ephah of fine flour <WH5560> for a meal-offering <WH4503>, mingled <WH1101> with oil <WH8081>, and the drink-offering <WH5262> thereof:
this is the burnt-offering <WH5930> of every sabbath <WH7676>, besides the continual <WH8548> burnt-offering <WH5930>, and the drink-offering <WH5930> thereof.

And in the beginnings <WH7218> of your months <WH2320> ye shall offer <WH7126> a burnt-offering <WH5930> unto Jehovah <WH3068>: two <WH8147> young <WH1241> bullocks <WH6499>, and one <WH259> ram <WH352>, seven <WH7651> he-lambs <WH3532> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old without blemish <WH8549>;

and three <WH7969> tenth parts of an ephah <WH6241> of fine flour <WH5560> for a meal-offering <WH4503>, mingled <WH1101> with oil <WH8081>, for each <WH259> bullock <WH6499>; and two <WH8147> tenth <WH6241> parts of fine flour <WH5560> for a meal-offering <WH4503>, mingled <WH1101> with oil <WH8081>, for the one <WH259> ram <WH352>;

and a tenth part <WH6241> of fine flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> with oil <WH8081> for a meal-offering <WH4503> unto every <WH259> lamb <WH3532>; for a burnt-offering <WH4503> of a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381>, an offering made by fire <WH801> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.

And their drink-offerings <WH5262> shall be half <WH2677> a hin <WH1969> of wine <WH3196> for a bullock <WH6499>, and the third <WH7992> part of a hin <WH1969> for the ram <WH352>, and the fourth <WH7243> part of a hin <WH1969> for a lamb <WH3532>: this is the burnt-offering <WH5930> of every month <WH2320> throughout the months <WH2320> of the year <WH8141>.

And one <WH259> he <WH8163> - goat <WH5795> for a sin-offering <WH2403> unto Jehovah <WH3068>; it shall be offered <WH6213> besides the continual <WH8548> burnt-offering <WH5930>, and the drink-offering <WH5930> thereof.
And in the first <WH7223> month <WH2320>, on the fourteenth <WH702> day <WH3117> of the month <WH2320>, is Jehovah <WH6453>'s passover.
And on the fifteenth <WH2568> day <WH3117> of this month <WH2320> shall be a feast <WH2282>: seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> shall unleavened bread <WH4682> be eaten <WH398>.
In the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> shall be a holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744>: ye shall do <WH6213> no servile <WH5656> work <WH4399>;

but ye shall offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire <WH801>, a burnt-offering <WH5930> unto Jehovah <WH3068>: two <WH8147> young <WH1241> bullocks <WH6499>, and one <WH259> ram <WH352>, and seven <WH7651> he-lambs <WH3532> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old <WH8549>; they shall be unto you without blemish;

and their meal-offering <WH4503>, fine flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> with oil <WH8081>: three <WH7969> tenth parts <WH6241> shall ye offer <WH6213> for a bullock <WH6499>, and two <WH8147> tenth parts <WH6241> for the ram <WH352>;
a tenth part <WH6241> shalt thou offer <WH6213> for every <WH259> lamb <WH3532> of the seven <WH7651> lambs <WH3532>;
and one <WH259> he-goat <WH8163> for a sin-offering <WH2403>, to make atonement for you <WH3722>.
Ye shall offer <WH6213> these besides the burnt-offering <WH5930> of the morning <WH1242>, which is for a continual <WH8548> burnt-offering <WH5930>.

After this manner ye shall offer <WH6213> daily <WH3117>, for seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>, the food <WH3899> of the offering made by fire <WH801>, of a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> unto Jehovah <WH3068>: it shall be offered <WH6213> besides the continual <WH8548> burnt-offering <WH5930>, and the drink-offering <WH5930> thereof.
And on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> ye shall have a holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744>: ye shall do <WH6213> no servile <WH5656> work <WH4399>.

Also in the day <WH3117> of the first-fruits <WH1061>, when ye offer <WH7126> a new <WH2319> meal-offering <WH4503> unto Jehovah <WH3068> in your feast of weeks <WH7620>, ye shall have a holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744>; ye shall do <WH6213> no servile <WH5656> work <WH4399>;

but ye shall offer <WH7126> a burnt-offering <WH5930> for a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> unto Jehovah <WH3068>: two <WH8147> young <WH1241> bullocks <WH6499>, one <WH259> ram <WH352>, seven <WH7651> he-lambs <WH3532> a <WH1121> year old <WH8141>;

and their meal-offering <WH4503>, fine flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> with oil <WH8081>, three <WH7969> tenth parts <WH6241> for each <WH259> bullock <WH6499>, two <WH8147> tenth parts <WH6241> for the one <WH259> ram <WH352>,
a tenth part <WH6241> for every <WH259> lamb <WH3532> of the seven <WH7651> lambs <WH3532>;
one <WH259> he-goat <WH5795>, to make atonement for you <WH3722>.

Besides the continual <WH8548> burnt-offering <WH5930>, and the meal-offering <WH4503> thereof <WH6213>, ye shall offer them <WH8549> (they shall be unto you without blemish), and their drink-offerings <WH5262>.
